1.stage: Search the tubes by barcode and then search their corresponding order. Assign a batch to the tubes in the orders.

steps.description: Find the tubes by barcodes for XX987654K
Get the search results (tubes)
Find the order by tube uuid and role
Get the search results (order)
Create a new batch
Assign the batch uuid to the tubes in the order items
Create the search order by batch
Get the result orders
Change the status of the order to pending
Change the status of the order to in_progress

4.stage: Re-Tubing. Create new tube and transfer from tube to tube.

steps.description: Create a new tube
Add the new tube in the order and start it
Transfer from first tube to second tube
Change the status of source tube to unused, new tube_to_be_extracted tube to done

5.stage: Create eppendorf a tube. Create aliquot a tube. Transfer the tube_to_be_extracted to eppendorf_a tube and to aliquot a tube.

steps.description: Create the tube aliquot a
Create the tube eppendorf a
Add the new tubes in the order and start them
Transfer
Change the status of source tube to unused, aliquot_a tube to done and eppendorf_a to done

6.stage: Create aliquot b tube. Transfer fron aliquot a tube to aliquot b tube

steps.description: Create the tube aliquot b
Add the new tube in the order and start it
Transfer
Change the status of aliquot a tube to unused, aliquot_b tube to done

7.stage: Create eppendorf b tube. Create aliquot c tube. Transfer from aliquot b to eppendorf b tube and aliquot c tube

steps.description: Create the tube eppendorf b
Create the tube eppendorf c
Add the new tube in the order and start it
Transfer
Change the status of aliquot b tube to unused, aliquot_c tube to done and eppendorf b to done

8.stage: RNA post extraction tube racking. Create new tubes. Add them in the order. Transfer RNA extracted tubes into 2D tubes. Then rack the 2D tubes in a tube rack.

steps.description: Create new tubes
Add the 2d tubes in the order and start them
Transfer extracted tubes into 2D tubes
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to unused. Change the status of 2d tubes to complete
Create a new tube rack
Add the tube rack in the order and start it
Change the type of the rube rack to complete

9.stage: DNA post extraction tube racking. Create new tubes. Add them in the order. Transfer DNA extracted tubes into 2D tubes. Then rack the 2D tubes in a tube rack.

steps.description: Create new tubes
Add the 2d tubes in the order and start them
Transfer extracted tubes into 2D tubes
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to unused. Change the status of 2d tubes to complete
Create a new tube rack
Add the tube rack in the order and start it
Change the type of the rube rack to complete

10.stage: Change the status of the order to completed.
